attributes.action: Create minimum mandatory custodial sentences for assaults on emergency workers.
attributes.additional_details: Increasing the maximum sentence is of limited use given sentencing guidelines. It has become distressingly acceptable in our society for these assaults to take place. We are on the path to utter anarchy. Our Emergency service workers deserve the support of Govt.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Remove the option of assaults on NHS staff being dealt with by a Police caution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316584

Mandatory jail sentence for assaulting (eg. spitting/coughing) emergency worker: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309432
